Subject: Practicing Mental Wellbeing Through Mindful Gratitude
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Valued Partners,

Practicing mindful gratitude can have a significant positive impact on well-being and mental health. In this newsletter, we explore its benefits and how it can enhance daily life.

Feel free to share it with your employees.

Happy reading!

Warm Regards, 


 <https://nascoconnect.com/resources/images/memberPortal/Icon_Colored_Logo.png>
